markdown.markdown: I will not be taking attendance in this course, and you do not need to inform me when you will be absent. If you are sick, please stay home. That said, I expect students to be present when possible, and consistent absences may impact your ability to earn full participation credit. If you can't make it to class, you may listen in on lectures via a link posted in Zoom and follow along with the class slides that will always be posted to our course website prior to the start of class. Please note, however, that you won't get the full classroom experience via Zoom. If you must miss a class entirely, you should contact a peer to discuss what was missed.
